text: Pomimo tekh, kto svyazan s tem narodom, Chto sostoit v soyuze s vami, Il' tekh, kotoryye pridut k vam s tyagost'yu v dushe Ot (nezhelan'ya) voyevat' Ni s vami i ni so svoim narodom. I yesli by zhelal Allakh, On dal by im nad vami moshch', I stali b oni s vami voyevat'. No yesli, ne srazhayas' s vami, Oni ot vas otstupyat i predlozhat mir, Allakh nedozvolyayet vam nikoyego puti (Vesti srazhen'ye) protiv nikh
